text: Mɨgahɨnia 19.36 2 Kin 9.13, Mt 21.8 udaci hulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ nudɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ nulɨdɨ hadi hɨlahɨla hutesɨ hutesɨ sabɨ lamavɨhadami agɨladɨ mɨŋahubɨlahubɨla hɨbɨ pɨlɨ hɨvɨ idalamalama uavɨmi. Idalamalama uavɨdaci sabaŋ donɨki agaŋ hadi hɨlahɨla hutesɨ hutesɨ agɨladɨ sabɨ hɨvɨ lagulagu umi. Jisasɨ sabaŋ donɨki hulɨ sabɨ hɨvɨ mɨgahɨniavɨla umi.
